name: AMELKIS
overview:
Designed for groups of all sizes, Amelkis Opera BPM is an enterprise consolidation, reporting, and unified budget and 100% customizable by its users

You are consolidator, accountant, controller, human resources manager, treasurer, quality manager, in charge of sustainable development and you need a powerful reporting solution. Discover how opera Amelkis packages allow hundreds of users get the best of technology.

Opera BPM groups Are you consolidator, controller or operations manager of a group of intermediate size and you need a system of performance management information, that can collect and analyze additional indicators and more, at angles different. Opera BPM solution designed to meet your expectations.

Opera Expert for accountant You are an expert accountant and you want to enter and develop building missions. To help you carry out these complex missions, designed a solution to Amelkis efficient and easy to take control.
